statements: SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_date, revenue FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, product_id, revenue FROM sales_reports WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_reports;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_date, revenue FROM sales_reports WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, product_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales_reports GROUP BY report_id, product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE revenue < 5000 AND product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales_reports;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports;
SELECT report_id, revenue FROM SalesReports WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, popularity_score FROM Products ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT report_id, revenue, date FROM SalesReports WHERE revenue > 10000;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, popularity_score FROM Products WHERE popularity_score >= 0.5 ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM Products JOIN SalesReports ON Products.product_id = SalesReports.report_id WHERE revenue < 5000 ORDER BY revenue ASC;
SELECT report_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM SalesReports GROUP BY report_id HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products JOIN SalesReports ON Products.product_id = SalesReports.report_id WHERE revenue > 2000 AND popularity_score > 0.8 ORDER BY date ASC, popularity_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT report_date, SUM(quantity_sold) FROM SalesReports GROUP BY report_date
SELECT product_name, product_category, unit_price FROM Products WHERE unit_price < 50
SELECT AVG(revenue) FROM SalesReports
SELECT product_id, popularity_score FROM PopularProducts
SELECT * FROM SalesReports WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT report_date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM SalesReports GROUP BY report_date HAVING total_revenue > 5000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;

SELECT SalesReports.report_date, Products.product_name, PopularProducts.popularity_score FROM SalesReports JOIN Products ON SalesReports.product_id = Products.product_id JOIN PopularProducts ON SalesReports.product_id = PopularProducts.product_id;
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue, MAX(quantity_sold) AS max_quantity_sold FROM SalesReports;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, revenue FROM SalesReports WHERE revenue > 1000.00 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, popularity_score FROM PopularProducts WHERE popularity_score >= 50;
SELECT * FROM SalesReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, popularity_score FROM PopularProducts JOIN Products ON PopularProducts.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY popularity_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers JOIN SalesReports ON Customers.customer_id = SalesReports.report_id WHERE Customers.customer_name = 'John' AND SalesReports.revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports;
SELECT report_id, revenue, report_date FROM sales_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_id, times_purchased FROM popular_products ORDER BY times_purchased DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_reports WHERE revenue > 10000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 7 AND quantity > 5;
SELECT product_id, times_purchased FROM popular_products ORDER BY times_purchased DESC, last_purchased_date ASC;
